oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jysk Ordbog (a-h), 17. April, 2011, xml-edition
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sørensen, Viggo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dialectology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Jysk Ordbog covers the dialects of Jutland c. 1700-1920. When finished the dictionary will contain c. 55.000 lemmas (often including sublemmas). The current version contains app. 16,00 entries. The word information comprises (1) pronunciation (in a simple, slightly extended Dania), (2) inflection, (3) meaning(s), (4) range, and (5) origin. Usage is shown by quotations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: The Peter Skautrup Centre, Aarhus University
